product_name: Mountaineers Books Avalanche Essentials: A Step-By-Step System for Safety and Survival
long_description: A primer for anyone headed to the snowy backcountry, Avalanche Essentials offers simple, effective techniques to increase your safety when traveling in avalanche terrain.
short_description: A primer for anyone headed to the snowy backcountry, Avalanche Essentials offers simple, effective techniques to increase your safety when traveling in avalanche terrain.
